caption.title: Biomarkers/parameters measured in each cohort participant during two months before, and during one month immediately after deliberate experimental inoculation with rhinovirus.
caption.p: The corresponding sampling frequencies can be found in columns 2 and 3. See the Materials and methods section below for more details on the study design, and on the measurement procedures and laboratory assays used. FEV1: forced expiratory volume in one second. FVC: forced vital capacity. PEF: peak expiratory flow. FeNO: fractional expired concentration of nitric oxide.

tr.td: Eosinophil and neutrophil cell density in nasal lavage fluid
